TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Fonts extends System.Object
public ref class Fonts abstract sealed

summary.span: 为 和 对象提供枚举支持。

span.span: Provides enumeration support for and objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字体系列是一套字体具有字体，例如 Arial，相同的但不同功能。A font family is a set of fonts that have the same typeface, such as Arial, but that differ in features. 这些功能差异包括，如斜体，和，如粗体。These feature differences include , such as italic, and , such as bold. ![字体](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "字体")![Fonts](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "Fonts") "Times New Roman"字体系列成员的字体的示例Example of typefaces that are "Times New Roman" font family members

summary.span: 从指定字体位置返回 对象的集合。

span.span: Returns the collection of objects from a specified font location.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法返回的集合基对象[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]位置。The following example shows how to use this method to return the collection of objects from a base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] location. [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#FontsSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontFamilySnippets.xaml.cs#fontssnippet1)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontsSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/fontfamilysnippets.xaml.vb#fontssnippet1)] 要返回的集合中应用程序的资源的对象使用"pack://application"[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]表示法中下面的示例所示。To return the collection of objects in an application's resources, use the "pack://application" [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] notation shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#FontsSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontFamilySnippets.xaml.cs#fontssnippet2)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontsSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/fontfamilysnippets.xaml.vb#fontssnippet2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法返回的集合对象从已解析的字体的位置。The following example shows how to use this method to return the collection of objects from the resolved font location. 在本示例中，应用程序包含一个名为“resources”的子目录。In this case, the application contains a subdirectory named "resources". [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#FontsSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontFamilySnippets.xaml.cs#fontssnippet3)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontsSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/fontfamilysnippets.xaml.vb#fontssnippet3)]
